thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 17 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Syndax Announces Updated Results From Phase 2 Encore 601 Trial Of Entinostat In Combination With Keytruda®

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Syndax Announces Updated Results From Phase 2 Encore 601 Trial Of Entinostat In Combination With Keytruda®
text:
May 17 (Reuters) - Syndax Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* SYNDAX ANNOUNCES UPDATED RESULTS FROM PHASE 2 ENCORE 601 TRIAL OF ENTINOSTAT IN COMBINATION WITH KEYTRUDA® (PEMBROLIZUMAB)
* SYNDAX PHARMACEUTICALS INC - POTENTIAL REGISTRATION PATHWAY IDENTIFIED IN NSCLC; NEXT TRIAL ANTICIPATED TO COMMENCE BY END OF 2018
* SYNDAX PHARMACEUTICALS INC - CONFIRMED OBJECTIVE RESPONSES WITH COMBINATION REGIMEN HAVE BEEN OBSERVED ACROSS ALL COHORTS IN PHASE 2 TRIAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
